name: Eye of the Owl - Bosch VR
description: Go back in time over 500 years to Hieronymus Bosch's studio and explore his masterpiece - The Garden of Earthly Delights
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or Higher Processor: P5 or Higher Graphics: GTX980 or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: P5 or higher Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX980 or higher
